dialogue.text: Hey, I’ve been thinking about us lately—do you feel like we’re still on the same page?
I’m glad you brought it up. Honestly, I think we need to talk more openly about what we both want.
Good afternoon, this is Emily from TechPlus. Could I have a moment of your time for a quick product feedback survey?
Hi Emily, sure, I just bought your latest smartphone and would be happy to share my thoughts.
Hello, this is Lisa Chan calling to confirm our family check-in for this Saturday at the Harbourview Hotel.
Hi Lisa, yes, your reservation for four at 3 PM on Saturday is confirmed. Looking forward to welcoming you all!
